div.bibl: THE REFORM ADVOCATE, Volume 71; Week of March 13, 1926 Page 176

body.p: Temple Sholom Congregation, which recently sold its property at Pine Grove Avenue and Grace Street has purchased a block of Sheidan Road frontage from Cornelia Avenue to Stratfor Place and will erect a $1,500,000 Temple and Community House.
The new Temple will contain two large auditoriums: one for church services, and the other for use as a community center.
